  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Physical change in matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körperliche Änderung im Stoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement physique de matière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança física na matéria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento fisico nella materia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αλλαγή σε θέμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio físico en materia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that gold can be changed physically from solid to liquid and to solid again by heating and cooling.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physical change</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reversible process</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Gold von Körper zu 
Flüssigkeit und zum Körper durch die Heizung und das Abkühlen 
physikalisch wieder geändert werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que de l'or peut être 
changé physiquement du solide en liquide et en solide encore par la 
chauffage et le refroidissement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que o ouro pode ser mudado 
fisicamente do sólido ao líquido e ao sólido outra vez se aquecendo
e refrigerando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che l'oro può essere 
cambiato fisicamente ancora dal solido a liquido ed al solido 
riscaldando e raffreddandosi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι το χρυσό μπορεί να 
αλλάξουν φυσικά από το στερεό στο υγρό και στο στερεό πάλι με 
τη θέρμανση και την ψύξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que el oro se puede cambiar 
físicamente del sólido al líquido y al sólido otra vez calentando 
y refrescándose.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüssigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stoff</string>
          </keyword>
